references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with clip latents
references.reason: This paper introduces a foundational approach to text-conditional image generation using CLIP latents, which is a core component of many subsequent TIE methods.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper presents Latent Diffusion Models, a fundamental technology enabling high-resolution image synthesis used extensively in tuning-free TIE methods.

references.paper_title: Prompt-to-prompt image editing with cross attention control
references.reason: This paper is a pivotal work introducing cross-attention control for prompt-to-prompt image editing, a crucial technique for balancing fidelity and editability.

references.paper_title: Null-text inversion for editing real images using guided diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Null-text inversion, a key method for encoding real images into a format editable by diffusion models, which is important for tuning-free image editing.
This paper introduces Denoising Diffusion Implicit Models (DDIM), an important technique for inverting images into latent space in diffusion-based models.
